item.description:
This topic was the entrance into Tantra for me.....if you are a woman seeking to conceive, are pregnant or would someday like to be....please join us for this extraordinary and critically important journey. It is through the process of giving birth that we will change the future of life on this planet. Sheri's path too started in the realm of birth as a certified nurse-midwife, gynecological practitioner and a holistic healing expert.

Workshop is from 1-5:30pm

Discover what Sheri learned from sex that she used to help women have great birthing experiences and what she learned from the birthing process that has helped her and others to have great sex. There's an integral relationship between the processes of birth, sexual arousal and orgasm -- each experience is an essential part of the other. Come discover the power of the process of the trance journeys of life.

Investment:$65 or $75 before 11/31
email Imani@thegreenvibration to register
item.name: Ecstatic Birth
